name: Dungeon Drudgery
description:
Arrow Keys to Move & Enter to Talk

Welcome to EVIL MARKETING! 

In Dungeon Drudgery, you are a determined young monster with an appointment to make & people to talk to. Wander your workplace! Listen to a bee's song! And best of all, you can do all of this in under 10 minutes!

Made in Bitsy :o)
